author: jlaskowski
msg: @ApplicationException is inheritable now, i.e. exceptions that inherit from @ApplicationException-annotated exceptions are application exceptions too. The remaining piece is to handle inherited element of the annotation.

BTW, although @ApplicationException is not @Inherited as far as Java annotation mechanism goes, but it is extended with inherited element so by default it *is* inherited (cf. 14.2.1 Application Exceptions in EJB 3.1 PFD - page 378)

author: angela
